title: JCAD CORE
description: JCAD CORE | Streamline and enhance compliance and enterprise risk management with JCAD's risk management solution, JCAD CORE. Our latest version, CORE 5 will be available later in the Autumn with a fresh new interface and new features! This fully customisable compliance and risk management software lets you manage risk to the level you want, with powerful monitoring and reporting functions to help you make informed decisions.
